title: Week 1: Introduction to AI
description: Explores the definition, overview, and history of Artificial Intelligence.

title: Week 2: Machine Learning Fundamentals
description: Covers supervised and unsupervised learning, algorithm varieties, and ethical considerations regarding algorithmic bias.

title: Week 3: Advanced Machine Learning Techniques
description: Introduces neural networks and deep learning concepts, along with a discussion on the ethical deployment of machine learning.

title: Week 4: Natural Language Processing
description: Focuses on text analysis, language models, sentiment analysis, and privacy issues in language processing.

title: Week 5: AI in Robotics and Computer Vision
description: Examines the role of robots in AI and the basics of computer vision, along with ethical ramifications in robotics.

title: Week 6: Data Ethics and Bias
description: Discusses the ethical considerations surrounding AI, including bias, privacy, and fairness, with group discussions on societal impacts.

title: Week 7: AI Applications in Healthcare and Finance
description: Explores AI applications across various industries through case studies that include contextual ethical discussions.

title: Week 8: Team Project Workshops
description: Guides students on proposing AI projects, forming teams, and developing project proposals with ethical underpinnings.

title: Week 9: Construction of AI Solutions
description: Provides hands-on experience in project implementation and follow-up lab sessions.

title: Week 10: Team Project Presentations
description: Facilitates team project presentations and peer feedback sessions.

title: Week 11: Future Trends in AI
description: Examines trends and future directions in AI along with emerging ethical challenges.

title: Week 12: Comprehensive Review and Feedback
description: Conducts a review of key concepts and engages in reflective discussions on learning outcomes.
